doc:
Jon St. Elwood https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jon_St._Elwood 0 Jon St. Elwood is an actor whose film and television career began in the late 1970s and carried on until around the late 1980s. He is familiar to soap opera fans as tough guy Jazz Jackson in the day time soap opera The Young and the Restless, a role he played for a couple of years in the mid-1980s. He also acted in the films, The Child Stealer in 1979, They Call Me Bruce? in 1982 and Against All Odds in 1984. Jon_St._Elwood is an_actor whose_film_and_television_career began in the_late_1970s and carried on until around the_late_1980s .
